media:group.media:title: Finding Venus during the daytime
media:group.media:description:
This video explains how to use an astrolabe and binoculars to locate Venus during the daytime.  You will need an accurate time source, which can either be a clock or an astrolabe sighting of the sun.  The latter is explained in 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tt-_GKmX8dk
